attributes.action: Enforce Kent County Council Budgets to be overseen by a Public Committee
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Force Kent County Council (KCC) to adhere to a public committee.
The committee should be responsible for the following :
Define Compensation scheme for all employees of KCC.
Define what services KCC should fund.
Authorize all KCC expenditure above (£25,000).
Authorize all KCC Projects.
Define goals for KCC to achieve.


KCC should be accountable to the committee in all its actions.
Committee should be able to overrule KCC.
Committee should decide management structure of KCC.
Committee should be made up of 12 council tax paying members of the public. None of which are allowed to work for KCC or sub contract to KCC in anyway including immediate family.  
No member should be a councillor, MP or be on any board of directors.
Members of the committee are not entitled to any salary.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
